UserAppInfo.name: UserAppInfo
UserAppInfo.description: Stores the last Lightning app logged in to. If the user hasn’t logged into Salesforce or if the user lost access to the last accessed app, the UserAppInfo object stores a Null value.

AppDefinitionId.description: The ID of the last Lightning app that the user logged in to. This field is available in API version 43.0 and later.

FormFactor.description: The relative size of the app as displayed. Values are: Small—suitable for a small device like a mobile phone Medium—suitable for a tablet Large—suitable for a large display device, like a monitor It’s possible to have three versions of the app as the one last logged in to, where each version has a different form factor.

UserId.description: The ID of the user that used this app.
